issue.title: Limiting the region in the scenario where the fog is active

content.raw: Currently we don't support setting the fog bounding box. Fog is normally a visual effect applied to the camera viewport and not tied to a 3D space in the world. You would need to look into writing your own shaders and setting them as the visual material for the underwater model to achieve the desired effect.
content.html: Currently we don't support setting the fog bounding box. Fog is normally a visual effect applied to the camera viewport and not tied to a 3D space in the world. You would need to look into writing your own shaders and setting them as the visual material for the underwater model to achieve the desired effect.
